resources.string: Tap to show info
Peak refresh rate
Minimum refresh rate
Automatically raises the refresh rate from 60 to %1$d Hz for some content. Increases battery usage.
Refresh Rate
Reduce refresh rate
Use 60 Hz screen refresh rate to save power when Battery Saver is on
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your tablet.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your device.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your phone.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the back of your tablet.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the back of your device.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the side of your tablet.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the side of your device.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the side of your phone.
Touch the sensor on the front of your tablet.
Touch the sensor on the front of your device.
Touch the sensor on the front of your phone.
Touch the sensor on the back of your tablet.
Touch the sensor on the back of your device.
Touch the sensor on the back of your phone.
Touch the sensor on the side of your tablet.
Touch the sensor on the side of your device.
Touch the sensor on the side of your phone.
Prevent accidental wake-up
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen from Double Tap 2 Wake gesture
In-call vibration options
Vibrate on connect
Vibrate on call waiting
Vibrate on disconnect
Annoying Notifications
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Enable advanced restart
Show options for recovery and bootloader in power menu
Swipe to screenshot
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
Radio info
Allow clients to use VPNs
Permit hotspot clients to use this device\u2019s VPN connections for upstream connectivity
Invert navigation bar layout
Swap the \"Back\" and \"Recents\" buttons on the navigation bar
Show volume panel on left
Move volume panel to the left side of the screen
Quick torch
When the screen is off, long-pressing power button will enable torch
Tap to sleep
Double-tap anywhere on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Low battery light
Blink LED when battery is low
Network traffic indicator
Enable or disable network speed indicator in status bar
Enable "Network traffic indicator"
Options
Hide network traffic indicator is inactive
Hide when network traffic indicator is below 1 KB/s
Customization
Show data usage
Show daily cellular/Wi-Fi data usage in QS footer
Status bar items
Control visibility of status bar icons
Show clipboard overlay
Show an overlay in the left bottom corner of the screen when something is copied to the clipboard
Playback control
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will skip music tracks
Change backup provider
Select backup provider
Ignore window secure flags
Remove screenshot and screenrecord limits for all apps. This can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks.
App lock
Unlock
Enable debugging
Disable debugging
Protected apps
Select the apps to protect with biometrics or device credentials
Auto lock timeout
Duration of time after which an unlocked app in background should be locked
Redact notifications
Notification content will be hidden and collapsed for selected apps when they are locked. Heads up notifications will be automatically disabled.
Protect an application first
Enable biometrics for unlocking
Bubbles will be automatically dismissed after timeout
Enable protection
Hide from launcher
Prevent this application from showing up in launcher. Requires a launcher restart for changes to take effect.
